## Lasso

Linear regression minimizes: 

$$ \sum_{i=1}^n \left(Y_i - \sum_{k=1}^K \beta_k X_{ik}\right)^2$$

Lasso minimizes

<center>
$\sum_{i=1}^n \left(Y_i - \sum_{k=1}^K \beta_k X_{ik}\right)^2$ where $\sum_{k=1}^K |\beta_k| < t$
</center>
